content: Honestly, you just need to calm down. So many lonely people look at each person of the opposite sex they meet as their potential next relationship. It’s desperate. I’m speaking from experience. My honest advice is that you shouldn’t be out there pursuing love. You should meet people and grow to love them as they are. Don’t create a space in your life and try to box people into it, fall for someone after you get to know them and then make that space for them in your life. Until then, just work on being happy as you.
